item.title: [mh2] Lightning Spear
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has trample.

{2}{R}, Sacrifice Lightning Spear: It deals 3 damage to any target.

Equip {1}

item.title: [mh2] Mine Collapse
item.description:
Instant

If it's your turn, you may sacrifice a Mountain rater than pay this spell's mana cost.

Mine Collapse deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [mh2] Mount Velus Manticore
item.description:
Enchantment Creature — Manticore

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card. When you do, Mount Velus Manticore deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of card types the discarded card has.

item.title: [mh2] Revolutionist
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Revolutionist enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [mh2] Unholy Heat
item.description:
Instant

Unholy Heat deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

Delirium — Unholy Heat deals 6 damage instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [mh2] Viashino Lashclaw
item.description:
Creature — Viashino Warrior

{T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.

item.title: [mh2] Bannerhide Krushok
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Trample

Reinforce 2—{1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.)

Scavenge {5}{G}{G} ({5}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [mh2] Crack Open
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [mh2] Deepwood Denizen
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Vigilance

{5}{G}, {T}: Draw a card. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each +1/+1 counter on creatures you control.

item.title: [mh2] Duskshell Crawler
item.description:
Creature — Insect

When Duskshell Crawler enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

item.title: [mh2] Flourishing Strike
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Flourishing Strike deals 5 damage to target creature with flying.

• Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

Entwine {2}{G} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

item.title: [mh2] Jewel-Eyed Cobra
item.description:
Creature — Snake

Deathtouch

When Jewel-Eyed Cobra dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [mh2] Smell Fear
item.description:
Sorcery

Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

Target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don't control.

item.title: [mh2] Dihada's Ploy
item.description:
Instant

Draw two cards, then discard a card. You gain life equal to the number of cards you've discarded this turn.

Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

item.title: [mh2] Foundry Helix
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent.

Foundry Helix deals 4 damage to any target. If the sacrificed permanent was an artifact, you gain 4 life.

item.title: [mh2] Storm God's Oracle
item.description:
Enchantment Creature — Human Shaman

{1}: Storm God's Oracle gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

When Storm God's Oracle dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.

item.title: [mh2] Terminal Agony
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature.

Madness {B}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [mh2] Wavesifter
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Flying

When Wavesifter enters the battlefield, investigate twice. (To investigate, create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

Evoke {G}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

item.title: [mh2] Fodder Tosser
item.description:
Artifact

{T}, Discard a card: Fodder Tosser deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

item.title: [mh2] Myr Scrapling
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Myr

Sacrifice Myr Scrapling: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

item.title: [mh2] Sojourner's Companion
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Salamander

Affinity for artifacts

Artifact landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an artifact land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

item.title: [mh2] Nested Shambler
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Nested Shambler dies, create X tapped 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens, where X is Nested Shambler's power.

item.title: [mh2] Resurgent Belief
item.description:
Sorcery

Suspend 2—{1}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{W} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Aura with nothing to enchant remain in your graveyard.)

item.title: [mh2] Resurgent Belief
item.description:
Sorcery

Suspend 2—{1}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{W} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Aura with nothing to enchant remain in your graveyard.)

item.description:

Flying

{W}: Marble Gargoyle gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

item.description:
Instant

"Lens Flare" deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

item.title: [mh2] Blossoming Calm
item.description:
Instant

You gain hexproof until your next turn. You gain 2 life.

Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [mh2] Necrogoyf
item.description:
Creature — Lhurgoyf

Necrogoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player discards a card.

Madness {1}{B}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [mh2] Blessed Respite
item.description:
Instant

Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

item.title: [mh2] Arcbound Prototype
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Assembly-Worker

Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

item.title: [mh2] Disciple of the Sun
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Lifelink

When Disciple of the Sun enters the battlefield, return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [mh2] Fairgrounds Patrol
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

{1}{W}, Exile Fairgrounds Patrol from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [mh2] Guardian Kirin
item.description:
Creature — Kirin

Flying

Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Guardian Kirin.

item.title: [mh2] Knighted Myr
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Myr Knight

{2}{W}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Knighted Myr, it gains double strike until end of turn.

item.title: [mh2] Marble Gargoyle
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Gargoyle

Flying

{W}: Marble Gargoyle gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [mh2] Piercing Rays
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target tapped creature.

Forecast—{2}{W}, Reveal Piercing Rays from your hand: Tap target untapped creature. (Activate only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

item.title: [mh2] Soul of Migration
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Flying

When Soul of Migration enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.

Evoke {3}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

item.title: [mh2] Burdened Aerialist
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

When Burdened Aerialist enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

Whenever you sacrifice a token, Burdened Aerialist gains flying until end of turn.

item.title: [mh2] Etherium Spinner
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Human Wizard

Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

item.title: [mh2] Foul Watcher
item.description:
Creature — Nightmare Bird

Flying

When Foul Watcher enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

Delirium — Foul Watcher gets +1/+0 as long as there are four more card types among cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [mh2] Parcel Myr
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Clue Myr

{2}, Sacrifice Parcel Myr: Draw a card.

item.title: [mh2] Recalibrate
item.description:
Instant

Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you've discarded a card this turn, draw a card.

item.title: [mh2] Cabal Initiate
item.description:
Creature — Human Warlock

Discard a card: Cabal Initiate gains lifelink until end of turn.

Threshold — Cabal Initiate get +1/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

item.title: [mh2] Gilt-Blade Prowler
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

{1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card. Activate only if you've discarded a card this turn.

item.title: [mh2] Hell Mongrel
item.description:
Creature — Nightmare Dog

Discard a card: Hell Mongrel gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
